member.name: T:ReportGenerator.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:ReportGenerator.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:ReportGenerator.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: M:ReportGenerator.SQLManager.GetConnectionString(System.String)
member.summary: Function to retrieve the connection from the app.config
member.param: Name of the connectionString to retrieve

member.name: M:ReportGenerator.SQLManager.GetBindingSource(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand)
member.summary: Returns a BindingSource, which is used with, for example, a DataGridView control
member.remarks: Use this function to ease populating controls that use a BindingSource

member.name: M:ReportGenerator.SQLManager.HandleConnection(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection)
member.summary: Method for handling the ConnectionState of the connection object passed to it
